whatsapp.title: How to share a chat from WhatsApp

android_steps.title: Install the application
android_steps.description: Make sure you have this app installed on your device

android_steps.title: Open your WhatsApp chat
android_steps.description: Go to the group or conversation you want to analyze

android_steps.title: Access the menu
android_steps.description: Tap the three dots in the upper right corner

android_steps.title: Select 'More'
android_steps.description: Look for and select the 'More' option in the dropdown menu

android_steps.title: Export the chat
android_steps.description: Select 'Export chat' from the available options

android_steps.title: Share with this app
android_steps.description: Choose this application from the list of options to share

ios_steps.title: Open your WhatsApp chat
ios_steps.description: Go to the group or conversation you want to export

ios_steps.title: Tap the chat name
ios_steps.description: At the top of the chat, tap the name to view details

ios_steps.title: Scroll to the bottom
ios_steps.description: In the chat information, scroll to the end of the screen

ios_steps.title: Export the chat
ios_steps.description: Tap 'Export chat' from the available options

ios_steps.title: Select Without Media
ios_steps.description: Choose the 'Without Media' option to export only the messages

ios_steps.title: Save to files
ios_steps.description: Tap 'Save to Files' to save on your iPhone

ios_steps.title: Save locally
ios_steps.description: Select 'On my iPhone' and tap save

ios_steps.title: Open our website
ios_steps.description: Open this website and select the saved file

desktop_steps.title: Open WhatsApp on your device
desktop_steps.description: Open the WhatsApp application on your mobile device (Android or iOS)

desktop_steps.title: Extract the chat
desktop_steps.description: Follow the export instructions according to your device (select the Android or iOS tab)

desktop_steps.title: Send the file by email
desktop_steps.description: Select 'Share' or 'Send by email' and send the file to yourself

desktop_steps.title: Access your email on PC
desktop_steps.description: On your computer (PC or Mac), open your email and look for the message with the chat

desktop_steps.title: Download the file
desktop_steps.description: Download the .txt attachment to your computer. Remember where you save it

desktop_steps.title: Visit ChatSalsa
desktop_steps.description: Open ChatSalsa in your computer's browser (the page you're on now)

desktop_steps.title: Upload the file
desktop_steps.description: Click on 'Upload file' and select the downloaded .zip chat file

preview.title: Discover the secrets of your WhatsApp conversations
preview.description: We combine statistics and advanced Artificial Intelligence to reveal fascinating data about the psychological profiles of participants and group dynamics.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our service

questions.question: How does the WhatsApp chat analysis work?
questions.answer: Our system analyzes the content of your exported WhatsApp conversations, identifying patterns, statistics, and trends. We use advanced algorithms and natural language processing to provide valuable insights about your communications.

questions.question: Is it safe to upload my conversations?
questions.answer: Yes, your privacy is our priority. We use end-to-end encryption, and your data is automatically deleted after analysis. We never permanently store any conversations and never share your information with third parties.

questions.question: What file formats are supported?
questions.answer: We currently support WhatsApp chat files exported in .txt format and .zip files containing WhatsApp exports.

questions.question: How many conversations can I analyze with my plan?
questions.answer: The number of conversations you can analyze depends on your subscription plan. Free users can analyze a limited number of chats, while premium subscribers enjoy a higher monthly quota. Check our Plans page for more details.

questions.question: How do I export a WhatsApp conversation?
questions.answer: In WhatsApp, open the chat you want to export, tap the three vertical dots > More > Export chat. You can choose to include media files or not. Then select how you want to share the exported file and save it to upload to our platform.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. The cancellation will be effective at the end of the current billing period.

content.text: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of the WhatsApp conversation analysis service provided by ChatSalsa. By using our service, you accept these terms in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you must not use our service.

Our service allows users to analyze exported WhatsApp conversations. It is your responsibility to ensure that you have the legal right to upload and analyze such conversations. You must not use our service for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
We respect your privacy and protect your personal data. We use secure encryption and delete your conversations after analysis. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

We offer different subscription plans with various features. Payments are processed through secure payment providers. Subscriptions automatically renew until canceled. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard.

ChatSalsa provides this service 'as is' and does not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. We are not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our service.
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on our website. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically.
If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us at support@chatsalsa.com.
At ChatSalsa, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our WhatsApp conversation analysis service.

We collect registration information (name, email) when you create an account, and temporarily process the content of WhatsApp conversations you upload for analysis. We also collect usage information and technical data to improve our service.
We use your information to provide and improve our service, process payments, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal information to third parties.
We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information. Conversations are encrypted during transmission and storage, and are automatically deleted after analysis.
We retain your account information as long as you maintain an active account. Uploaded conversations are deleted after analysis, typically within 24 hours.

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to processing or request data portability. To exercise these rights, contact us at support@chatsalsa.com.
We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes through a visible notice on our website or by email.
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@chatsalsa.com.
